quote: You just don’t get it. The point I’m trying to make—the point you’re deliberately ignoring—is that tomorrow it might all go away. You have to do what you want and take what you want now.
quote_letters: YOU JUST DONT GET IT THE POINT IM TRYING TO MAKE-THE POINT YOURE DELIBERATELY IGNORING-IS THAT TOMORROW IT MIGHT ALL GO AWAY YOU HAVE TO DO WHAT YOU WANT AND TAKE WHAT YOU WANT NOW
